nodes.bodyText: What about skipping RevApi as well? Also do these flags need =true?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -266,7 +266,7 @@ jobs:
         inputs:
           mavenPomFile: sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/pom.service.xml
           options: ${{ parameters.TestOptions }}
-          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions)'
+          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dspotbugs.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip'

nodes.bodyText: Also is this the right file for it to be added to? Doesn't look like the PR validation test runs have these additional arguments.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -266,7 +266,7 @@ jobs:
         inputs:

-          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions)'
+          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dspotbugs.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip'

nodes.bodyText: revapi does not run for verify goal. Also, this is the file I updated when I changed the goal from test to verify. Not sure about "=true", didn't have to use it on my machine, may be required for CI?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -266,7 +266,7 @@ jobs:
         inputs:
           mavenPomFile: sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/pom.service.xml
           options: ${{ parameters.TestOptions }}
-          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions)'
+          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dspotbugs.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip'

nodes.bodyText: I'm pretty sure you're going to want the =true just to be safe. There's an example of skipping these exact items in eng/pipelines/client.yml which sets the options as "-Dmaven.javadoc.skip=true -Dcheckstyle.skip=true -Dspotbugs.skip=true'"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -266,7 +266,7 @@ jobs:
         inputs:
           mavenPomFile: sdk/${{parameters.ServiceDirectory}}/pom.service.xml

-          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions)'
+          mavenOptions: '$(MemoryOptions) $(LoggingOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip -Dspotbugs.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip'
